alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Hill County; Northern Blaine County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 16 at 2:23PM MST until November 17 at 12:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to one inch at lower elevations, and up to 3 inches in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine, Eastern Toole and Liberty, Hill County and Northern Blaine County. * WHEN...Until Midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact this evening`s peak travel time.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Hill County; Northern Blaine County
